articles.title: Trump tariffs live updates: Trump announces tariffs on European countries until deal is reached for 'purchase of Greenland'; Danish PM says Europe 'will not be blackmailed' - Yahoo Finance

articles.content: After President Trump posted his plan to levy new tariffs on Europe on Saturday, reaction was swift and fierce. Trump said the US would implement 10% tariffs on eight European countries he says are g… [+2463 chars]
